item.title: MIUI V12.5.5.0.RKXEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi Pad 5 EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 5 EEA

Codename: nabu

Version: V12.5.5.0.RKXEUXM | 11.0

Size: 2.7 GB

MD5: 34f517df771773f82fe6239254cb4736

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Resource-intensive games can now work in the background
Fix: Device rebooted unexpectedly in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to September 2021. Increased system security.
[Stylus & keyboard]
Optimization: Xiaomi Smart Pen's performance
Fix: Keyboards couldn't be connected in some cases
[Split screen]
Fix: Split screen didn't always work normally
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Audio quality for games
[Other]
Fix: Wi-Fi connection abnormalities

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
